item.title: Properties of optimal regression designs under the second-order least squares estimator
item.description: Optimal regression design problem under the SLS estimator with A-, D- and c-optimal design criterion.

item.title: Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes.

I am a first year PhD student at the University of Waterloo under joint supervision of Prof. Greg Rice and Prof. Joel Dubin. I am also affiliated with Health Data Science Lab (HDSL). My other personal website hosted by UWaterloo server can be found here. Before arriving to UWaterloo, I obtained MSc and BSc degrees at the University of Victoria in a beautiful city, Victoria, British Columbia, Canada. In my spare time, I like to play basketball, and reading books, articles and random posts in various different genre.
